net.sf.tweety.logics.pcl

Class GeneralizedMeReasoner

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.tweety.commons.Reasoner
      • net.sf.tweety.logics.pcl.GeneralizedMeReasoner

  • public class GeneralizedMeReasoner
extends net.sf.tweety.commons.Reasoner
    This class implements a generalized maximum entropy reasoner for probabilistic conditional logic as proposed in [Potyka, Thimm, 2014] which also works for inconsistent belief sets. It computes the generalized ME-distribution for the given belief set and answers queries with respect to this ME-distribution.
    Author:
    Matthias Thimm

                             int p)
        Creates a new generalized ME-reasoner for the given knowledge base.
        Parameters:
        beliefBase - a pcl belief set.
        p - determines p-norm for computing minimal violation.
        solver - the solver used

      • GeneralizedMeReasoner

        public GeneralizedMeReasoner(net.sf.tweety.commons.BeliefBase beliefBase,
                             net.sf.tweety.commons.Signature signature,
                             int p)
        Creates a new generalized ME-reasoner for the given knowledge base.
        Parameters:
        beliefBase - a pcl belief set.
        signature - another signature (if the probability distribution should be defined on that one (that one should subsume the signature of the belief base)
        norm - the norm used for computing minimal violation.
        solver - the solver used
